name: Rishi Pragati Sheel Shikshan Sansthan

address: Little Star School, Shiv Puri Colony, N – 1/59 A – 23 - 22, Nagwa–Lanka

briefDescription: Founded in 1996, Little Stars School provides a completely free education to the underprivileged and poor children in the slums of Varanasi. At current Little Stars provides an education for over 800 children and runs a girls hostel providing shelter for over 20 homeless and abandoned girls.
